original_text: For Mordecai the Jew was second in rank to King Ahasuerus, and he was great among the Jews and popular with the multitude of his brothers, for he sought the welfare of his people and spoke peace to all his people.
korean_text: 유다인 모르드개가 아하수에로 왕의 다음이 되고 유다인 중에 크게 존경받고 그의 허다한 형제에게 사랑을 받고 그의 백성의 이익을 도모하며 그의 모든 종족을 안위하였더라

sentences.original_text: For Mordecai the Jew was second in rank to King Ahasuerus
sentences.korean_translation: 유대인 모르드개는 아하수에로 왕 다음가는 둘째 지위였으니

sentences.original_text: and he was great among the Jews
and popular with the multitude of his brothers
for he sought the welfare of his people
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 자기 백성의 안녕을 구했고

sentences.original_text: and spoke peace to all his people.
